hero.title: Secure Authentication Token Management
hero.description: Store and manage your TOTP authentication tokens securely with PassStorage. The modern solution for all your 2FA needs.

features.title: Key Features
features.description: PassStorage provides everything you need to manage your authentication tokens securely and efficiently.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All your authentication tokens are encrypted and stored locally for maximum security.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Access
crossPlatform.description: Access your tokens from any device with our responsive web application.

sharing.title: Organization Sharing
sharing.description: Share tokens with your team securely through our organization features.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Getting started with PassStorage is simple and straightforward.

step1.title: Create Account
step1.description: Sign up for a free account to get started with basic features.

step2.title: Add Your Tokens
step2.description: Import your authentication tokens or create new ones directly.

step3.title: Secure Access
step3.description: Easily access your tokens whenever you need them, on any device.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Start for free and upgrade as you grow.

cta.title: Ready to secure your authentication?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust PassStorage with their authentication tokens. Start for free, no credit card required.
